about_the_game:
Welcome to Sweetwater, a once-idyllic suburban neighborhood now shrouded in terror. In Waffle Cone Willie, a first-person horror survival game, you must evade a haunted killer ice cream truck as you unravel the sinister secrets lurking in the shadows.

Run, hide, and sneak from house to house in the town of Sweetwater, as you uncover its mysteries, solve puzzles, and survive the ever-hunting threat of Waffle Cone Willie until you gather what you need to finally confront Willie and escape this nightmare.

The ghost of convicted killer, and once loved ice cream truck driver Willie, has taken an unexpected and terrifying form. Possessing an old ice cream truck, this malevolent spirit, known as Waffle Cone Willie, haunts the streets, spreading fear and chaos.

Tread carefully as the safety of each home you explore in Sweetwater is just a facade as you reveal more and more paranormal threats and activities occurring around the town.

Key Features:



Survival and Stealth:
Evade detection by the killer ice cream truck by crouching and avoiding its line of sight. Listen for the haunting jingle of the truck and hide in homes or shadows to stay out of sight.


Exploration and Puzzle-Solving:
Explore various homes and locations within Sweetwater, each filled with secrets and dangers. Solve environmental puzzles to unlock new areas, find vital clues, and piece together the mystery of Waffle Cone Willie.


Dynamic AI:
Experience the chilling challenge of Willie’s adaptive AI, which learns and counters your tactics, keeping the tension high as you navigate the town.


Atmospheric Elements:
Immerse yourself in a tense, eerie atmosphere with sound and visual cues that heighten the horror. The truck’s ice cream distorted jingle sets the mood and becomes more menacing as it nears, signaling the need to hide or run.

Are you ready to confront the malevolent force that haunts Sweetwater? Prepare yourself for a chilling, heart-pounding experience in Waffle Cone Willie, where every decision could mean the difference between life and a terrifying demise. Will you uncover the truth and survive, or will Waffle Cone Willie claim another victim?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent 64-bit distribution
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD with proprietary drivers installed (NVIDIA drivers or AMDGPU/AMDGPU-PRO for AMD)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. This game was built for Windows and may not be optimized for Linux.
